REBATE MANAGEMENT
Rebate Analytics Dashboards

Rebate Analytics dashboards give you actionable insights into rebate programs to help you fine-tune programs, achieve business goals, and boost product sales.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in Developer, Enterprise, and Unlimited editions where the Manufacturing Cloud is enabled

Rebate Analytics includes:

In-app dashboards that you access through CRM Analytics Studio.
Embedded dashboards that deliver insights from the context of Salesforce objects you work with.
Preconfigured Einstein Discovery Story that provides intelligent insights that help you to reduce payouts per transaction and increase your revenue.
In-App Dashboards

Use the Analytics for Manufacturing app to access the Rebate Analytics in-app dashboards in CRM Analytics Studio. Open the Rebates Home dashboard to get a quick insight into the key metrics of your rebate programs.

Business Insights: Analyze your rebate programs and learn how they’re affecting your business. Get insights based on factors such as payouts, product sales, product pricing, and overall revenue.
Rebate Program Analysis: Get a detailed analysis of a rebate program based on member performance, rebate types, tiers, product sales, and revenue to payout ratio.
Rebate Insights: Get a comprehensive view of your ship and debit rebate programs, track claims, analyze trends, identify high-rebate accounts, and assess special-pricing impact.
Embedded Dashboards

The Analytics for Manufacturing app includes Rebate Analytics dashboards that you can embed in Lightning Experience pages. Salesforce admins embed these dashboards in specific object pages.

Operational Insights: Embed on the Rebate Program page to monitor the performance of the program, view a leaderboard of members and products, and identify products to upsell.
Account Incentives: Embed on the Account page to monitor the impact of rebate programs on account revenue. The dashboards track account activity and help you identify products to upsell.
Sales Agreement: Embed on the Sales Agreement page for insights into the associated incentives. Track the compliance of products with incentives and devise strategies to improve overall product compliance.
Orders: Embed on the Order page to get insight into associated rebate programs. Also, see how many purchases are required for tier upgrade.
Business Insights Dashboard
Analyze your rebate programs and learn how they’re affecting your business revenue. Get insights based on factors such as payouts, product sales, product pricing, and overall revenue.
Rebate Program Analysis
Get a detailed analysis of a rebate program based on member performance, rebate types, tiers, product sales, and revenue-to-payout ratio.
Rebates Insights Dashboard
The Rebates Insights dashboard provides original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) with a comprehensive view of their ship and debit rebate programs. Use the insights to track claims, analyze trends, identify high-rebate accounts, assess special-pricing impact, and optimize programs for stronger partner relationships.
Operational Insights Dashboard
Embed the Operation Insights dashboard on the Rebate Program page to monitor the performance of the program, view a leaderboard of members and products, and identify products for upsell.
Account Incentives Dashboard
Embed the Account Incentives dashboard on the Account page to monitor the impact of rebate programs on account revenue. The visualizations help you track account activity and identify products to upsell.
Sales Agreement Dashboard
Embed the Sales Agreement dashboard on the Sales Agreement page to get insights into associated incentives. Track the compliance of products with incentives and devise strategies to improve overall product compliance.
Orders Dashboard
Embed the Orders dashboard on the Order page to get insights into the associated rebate programs. Also, see how many purchases are required for tier upgrade.
